name: The Elementals (StingJay007)
description: In this game you will fight many enemies with multiple weapons and it even has a boss fight at the end. Please tell me about any improvements I could make in the comments below. This is my first game and there are still many things I want to add to the game for example, new enemies, more guns, different bosses and new levels to explore and try to beat. Stay updated to see these new features being added every week.
